text: Wuh yihī kuchh apne tamām ḳhatoṅ meṅ likhtā hai jab wuh is mazmūn kā zikr kartā hai. Us ke ḳhatoṅ meṅ kuchh aisī bāteṅ haiṅ jo samajhne meṅ mushkil haiṅ aur jinheṅ jāhil aur kamzor log toṛ-maroṛ kar bayān karte haiṅ, bilkul usī tarah jis tarah wuh bāqī sahīfoṅ ke sāth bhī karte haiṅ. Lekin is se wuh apne āp ko hī halāk kar rahe haiṅ.
